fulltext:
Vu Quang Vinh
vuquangvinh0412@ gmail.com
(+84) 906391712
Gender Male
Nationality Vietnamese
Date of Birth
Dec 04, 1991
Vu Quang Vinh
Software/Data Engineer
About Me I am known as outspoken, easygoing man. I love natural sci-
ence and natural landscape.
Objective Become a software tech lead and a senior data engineer
Experiences
[Sep 2017 - Now] Senior fullstack developer at Eastagile
• Explore Chicago police complaint dataset and make visualizations
• Develop a website about complaints and polices in Chicago (and
other cities in US)
• Technologies I used:
◦ Django
◦ REST framework
◦ Elasticsearch
◦ Postgre
◦  React ◦  Selenium/Nightwatch ◦  Enzyme ◦  D3
◦ Agile
◦ TDD & BDD
◦ Git Flow
◦  Kubernetes ◦  CircleCI ◦  Docker ◦  Ansible
◦ Google Cloud
◦ AWS
◦ Azure
◦  Python ◦  JavaScript ◦  CSS/SASS ◦  HTML
[Mar 2017 - Sep 2017] Data Scientist at Deﬁde
• Working on NLP and Deep learning to develop a Japanese chat bot
• Technologies I used:
◦  TensorFlow ◦  Pandas ◦  Numpy
◦ Deep Leaning
◦ LSTM attention
◦ Named Entity Recognition
◦  AWS ◦  Python
[Sep 2016 - Mar 2017] Software Engineer at PL lab, POSTECH
• Develop a Hadoop engine named MR3
• What I have learned:
◦ Scala
◦ Java
◦ Bash Shell
◦  Hadoop ◦  Tez ◦  Spark
◦ Multi-thread Programming
◦ Git
◦ Clean Code
[Oct 2014 - Sep 2015] Researcher at R&D department - TMA Solutions
• Research on ML and NLP for various potential problems
• Develop a demo Hadoop system for social network investment
• What I have learned:
◦  Theano ◦  Pandas ◦  Numpy
◦  MongoDB ◦  Redis ◦  Git
◦ NLTK
◦ Deep Learning
Education
2014 - 2016, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology(JAIST)
M.Eng. in Information Science
Thesis title: Counterexample-guided abstraction reﬁnement for points-to
analysis of object-oriented programs
2009 - 2014, Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology
B.Eng. in Computer Science - Honor Program - GPA: 8.06/10.0
Languages
English - Toeic 810
